import { useContext, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Loader } from 'react-loaders'; import './index.scss'; import AnimatedLetters from '../../components/AnimatedLetters/index'; import PortfolioContext from '../../context/PortfolioContext'; export default function Contact() { const { letterClass, setLetterClass } = useContext(PortfolioContext); const contactMe = 'Contato'; useEffect(() => { setTimeout(() => { setLetterClass('text-animate-houver'); }, 3000); return () => setLetterClass('text-animate'); }, [setLetterClass]); return ( <>

{} }>
